DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To estimate whether minocycline hydrochloride ( minocycline ) alleviate paclitaxel-induced peripheral neuropathy . II . To estimate whether minocycline alleviate paclitaxel acute pain syndrome ( P-APS ) . III . To examine possible relative toxicity relate minocycline therapy study situation . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Patients receive minocycline hydrochloride orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) day 1-7 . Treatment repeat every 7 day 12 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . ARM II : Patients receive placebo PO BID day 1-7 . Treatment repeat every 7 day 12 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study , patient follow every month 6 month .
